title: WTT my T209-2 and T210 for lots
author: smtjoy

posts.post_title: WTT my T209-2 and T210 for lots
posts.post_content:
Here is my trade list of T209-2 and T210's, what im looking for - first anything on my exhibit needs list, second any T209/T210 I might need then finally I am game for trading for any other vintage or big HOF card that I like, pretty open.  Let me know what you have to trade.

T209-2
